price: Woi nom ne εdͻm no a wͻne mo bɛwura mu, yεmma wͻn akwaaba. Nokorε sε wͻbεhye wͻ egya no mu.
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
